body_html:
I had the same issue. Here is my solution.

Add the config option when you define your estimator, for exzample:

config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(gpu_memory_fraction=0.3)
estimator = tf.contrib.learn.LinearRegressor(feature_columns=features, config=config)

But I still want to know how I can only use CPU.
body_text:
I had the same issue. Here is my solution.
Add the config  option when you define your estimator, for exzample:

estimator = tf.contrib.learn.LinearRegressor(feature_columns=features, config=config)
But I still want to know how I can only use CPU.
body:
I had the same issue. Here is my solution.

Add the `config`  option when you define your estimator, for exzample: 

```python
config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(gpu_memory_fraction=0.3)
estimator = tf.contrib.learn.LinearRegressor(feature_columns=features, config=config)
```

But I still want to know how I can only use CPU.
